titles.title: Protecting Financial Privacy Act of 2021
A bill to prohibit any Federal agency from requiring financial institutions to report on the financial transactions of their customers.
Protecting Financial Privacy Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Protecting Financial Privacy Act of 2021
This bill prohibits a federal agency from creating, implementing, or administering a program that requires financial institutions or individuals to report on the balances of, transactions involving, or transfers into and out of financial accounts.
